description: Updates Amazon QuickSight customizations for the current Amazon Web Services Region. Currently, the only customization that you can use is a theme. You can use customizations for your Amazon Web Services account or, if you specify a namespace, for a Amazon QuickSight namespace instead. Customizations that apply to a namespace override customizations that apply to an Amazon Web Services account. To find out which customizations apply, use the DescribeAccountCustomization API operation.

parameters.name: AwsAccountId
parameters.description: The ID for the Amazon Web Services account that you want to update Amazon QuickSight customizations for.

parameters.name: AccountCustomization
parameters.description: The Amazon QuickSight customizations you're updating in the current Amazon Web Services Region. DefaultTheme (string) --- The default theme for this Amazon QuickSight subscription. DefaultEmailCustomizationTemplate (string) --- The default email customization template.

nested_params.name: DefaultTheme
nested_params.description: The default theme for this Amazon QuickSight subscription.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for the updated customization for this Amazon Web Services account.

nested_items.name: AwsAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID for the Amazon Web Services account that you want to update Amazon QuickSight customizations for.

nested_items.name: Namespace
nested_items.description: The namespace associated with the customization that you're updating.

nested_items.name: AccountCustomization
nested_items.description: The Amazon QuickSight customizations you're updating in the current Amazon Web Services Region.

nested_items.name: DefaultTheme
nested_items.description: The default theme for this Amazon QuickSight subscription.

nested_items.name: RequestId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Web Services request ID for this operation.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The HTTP status of the request.
